page.title: 05HOUSING AND NEW BUILDING
page.content: at Ferndale Road, Burnthill Crescent, and the Antrim Road at Swanston Park are also being used for new houses. A larger development of timber framed houses are being built at Ballyhenry Gardens and adjacent Dorchester Gardens. All ages of the community live in Glengormley and the area has blossomed over the past 20 years with easy access to Belfast and the rest of the province via the M2. About 75% of houses in the area are semidetached with newer houses being increasingly bungalows and detached homes. Older pre war houses are found along the main roads, with newer houses filling areas between. Traditionally built brick houses with local N. Ireland bricks, tiles and limestone chipping constitute 90% of the houses, the remaining 10% are new
